mapper.select: select max(dayId)+1 from totalPromotion where createTime >= #{today}
mapper.insert: insert into totalPromotion(dayId, createTime, lastModifiedTime, beginTime, endTime, requiredTotal, tokenAmount, gifts) values(#{dayId}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifiedTime}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{requiredTotal}, #{tokenAmount}, #{gifts, typeHandler=MyJsonHandler})
mapper.update: update totalPromotion set lastModifiedTime=#{lastModifiedTime}, beginTime=#{beginTime}, endTime=#{endTime}, requiredTotal=#{requiredTotal}, tokenAmount=#{tokenAmount}, gifts=#{gifts, typeHandler=MyJsonHandler} where dayId=#{dayId} and createTime=#{createTime}
mapper.delete: delete from totalPromotion where dayId=#{dayId} and createTime=#{createTime}
mapper.select: select * from totalPromotion where beginTime <= #{begin} and endTime >= #{end}
